originalText.text:
My visit today with Dr. Ostad
was as always, fabulous.
I trust him implicitly.

I feel cared for, listened to,
and the quality of care
is incredible.

I simply cannot imagine seeing another
dermatologist for my care.
Thank you so much!

originalText.text: Dr. Ostad is completely  dedicated to his profession and highly skilled. He is the only person I would go to for skin issues on my face. He has performed Moh’s surgery on my nose and chest.. the scars are undetectable. The office is beautifully run. The whole experience takes any worry and anxiety away. Highly recommended.

text.text: Dr. Ostad is completely  dedicated to his profession and highly skilled. He is the only person I would go to for skin issues on my face. He has performed Moh’s surgery on my nose and chest.. the scars are undetectable. The office is beautifully run. The whole experience takes any worry and anxiety away. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Very friendly staff. Dr. Ostad is very competent. He explained everything very well and I felt very confident in his abilities. Procedures are expensive, perhaps somewhat more than I anticipated (I knew cosmetic work is not inexpensive) Overall I am very satisfied with my experience.

text.text: Very friendly staff. Dr. Ostad is very competent. He explained everything very well and I felt very confident in his abilities. Procedures are expensive, perhaps somewhat more than I anticipated (I knew cosmetic work is not inexpensive) Overall I am very satisfied with my experience.

originalText.text:
Dr. Ostad did Mohs surgery on my husband’s face.  I can’t see where the work was performed.  I have been going to Dr. Ostad for Botox and fillers for several years now.  I have been to several dermatologists before, none of whom made me look as naturally younger.  He has a gentle touch.  He uses state of the art equipment for laser and other equipment for body treatments.  Dr. Ostad is kind and you never feel rushed at any point there.
The office is both luxurious and Immaculate.  The office staff is professional and well mannered.  The nursing staff takes the time to address any questions you may have, makes sure you understand all aftercare and will give you whatever is needed for that.  They are personable as well which puts you at ease and you feel that they really care about you as a patient and as a human being.  They do have a product line which actually works, but you never feel they are “selling” you.
Most important of all Dr Ostad is an artist for your face and body work.  I always feel more confident in myself when I leave that office, after all the first judgement of you is your looks.  Dr. Ostad improves that.

originalText.text: I have been very pleased with the services I received from your practice. your operation is very efficient and runs like an oiled machine. Easy to make an appointment with very pleasant Office staff, and wonderful nurses who went above and beyond to help me. I would also like to mention that you are the best of the best! Thank you so much for the wonderful treatment. You have been a caring, passionate, skilled, and friendly doctor. I had an amazing experience and your skilled services were outstanding.
